registration

Keystone DH 2024 @ Penn State Erie, The Behrend College

The conference venue and accommodations are all located at the Penn State Erie, The Behrend College campus.

Venue - Reed Union Building, McGarvey Commons??

The 2024 Keystone Digital Humanities conference will be hosted on the ground floor of the Reed Union Building at Penn State Erie, The Behrend College. The main entrance to the building is off of Reed Lot from Behrend College Drive. Most events will occur on the ground floor of the building in the McGarvey Commons.

Address: 4800 College Dr, Erie, PA 16510

Registration

Registration forms are not up yet! They will be on March 15th though!

Prices (NOT including housing)

  • Student/Faculty: $30
  • Full-time: $70
